attributes.action: Install CCTV cameras to deter crimes in places like Lennox park and more.
attributes.background: Bearsden and Milngavie is safe but there are areas such as Lennox park and the wedge were crime is alot more prominent. With information from community members we will know the best and most effect places for CCTV ultimately making both Bearsden and Milngavie safer for everyone.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the local authority. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
